Class ThePendulum

java.lang.Object
  ThePendulum

public class ThePendulum
extends java.lang.Object

Where all of the pendulums parameters are set Updates the position and values of the pendulum according to the values its given

Author:
06ahmedA

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
Draws the string and the ball on the screen/ panel. This uses the values from all of the set methods If the ball glass_sphere isn't loaded then a default ball will be drawn in its place.

Parameters:
g - graphic object to draw with

updatePosition

public void updatePosition()
Updates the position of the pendulum whilst adding drag to the pendulum
